duties_responsibilities.duty: Understanding and meeting clients' needs and expectations, and developing a knowledge of their businesses, control systems, and industry-related issues.
Assessing risks and evaluating the client's internal control structure to identify and resolve accounting or reporting issues.
Performing substantive tests and tests of internal controls.
Assisting in drafting financial statements under prescribed formats.

education_certification.credential: 90 credit hours, working towards B.A. / B.S. degree or equivalent, and Accounting Major
